results.original_title: Les Fonda : une dynastie de cinéma
results.overview: The story of legendary actor Henry Fonda (1905-1982), and his children, Jane (1937) and Peter (1940-2019), who would become famous performers in their own right, pop culture icons, and political and social activists; three members of Hollywood royalty who maintained a tense and complicated relationship.
results.title: The Fondas: A Cinematic Dynasty

results.overview: Very few Icons have at once embodied the Myths of their own country while revealing its contradictions: heiress of the Hollywood star system and muse of the French auteur Cinema, Academy Award winning actress and committed producer, feminist and aerobic queen, activist and fearless businesswoman…  In a lifetime, Jane Fonda may have reconciled all the facets of America without renouncing her own integrity. Through her portrait, the film tells a social and political story while drawing the picture of a typically American phenomenon.
results.title: Citizen Jane Fonda

results.original_title: Le jour où j’ai découvert que Jane Fonda était brune
results.overview: “I ask my mother about her past feminist commitment, and why she made a child on her own. She doesn’t answer me. I want to pierce the mystery of my mother. I discover the women’s movement of the 1970s, an activist feminist cinema, and the woman filmmaker that I am changes. I meet and testify to the transmission of a memory of feminist struggles through collective cinematographic practices.” Anna Salzberg
results.title: The Day I Discovered that Jane Fonda Was a Brunette

results.original_title: Worakls à la Fondation Vasarely - Passengers
results.overview: Passengers gives Worakls the keys to the Vasarely Foundation. Accompanied by an orchestra, the electro artist explores the various spaces of the Aix-en-Provence institution, revisiting some of the finest tracks in his repertoire.
results.title: Worakls - Passengers: Fondation Vasarely

results.overview: Girl next door, activist, so-called traitor, fitness tycoon, Oscar winner: Jane Fonda has lived a life of controversy, tragedy and transformation – and she’s done it all in the public eye. An intimate look at one woman’s singular journey.
results.title: Jane Fonda in Five Acts

results.overview: Profiling the life and career of actor Henry Fonda, who starred in such film classics as "The Grapes of Wrath" and "12 Angry Men."
results.title: Henry Fonda: Hollywood's Quiet Hero

results.overview: Anna wants to share her chocolate cake with her friend and ends up living an adventure through the forest, where the terrible bearded giant is the Fnew inhabitant. In fact, all the animals that she meets are disappFeFaring. Does the giant need company?
results.title: Melting Heart Cake

results.original_title: The Rolling Stones: From the Vault - Sticky Fingers Live at the Fonda Theatre 2015
results.overview: The Rolling Stones kicked off their 2015 North American tour at the Fonda Theatre where they performed the entire Sticky Fingers album.
results.title: The Rolling Stones: From the Vault - Sticky Fingers Live at the Fonda Theatre 2015

results.overview: Jane Fonda hosts a tribute to her father.
results.title: Fonda on Fonda

results.overview: Episode of the BBC television program with host Michael Parkinson interviewing American actor Henry Fonda.
results.title: Parkinson: Meet Henry Fonda

results.original_title: Jane Fonda & Lily Tomlin: Ladies Night Live
results.overview: Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin host an iconic celebration of women in comedy with stand-up sets from Cristela Alonzo, Margaret Cho, Michelle Buteau and more.
results.title: Jane Fonda & Lily Tomlin: Ladies Night Live

results.overview: In an unexplored vault in Belgrade, the capital of the former Yugoslavia, lies a collection of films known as “the Labudović Reels.” On them are images of African and Asian liberation movements and revolutionary leaders that defined the era of the 1960s. How is it that the archive of these revolutions lies on another continent, forgotten in a film archive? The answer to this question takes us into the story behind the images, on an intimate voyage with the man who filmed them.  As the cameraman of Yugoslav president Tito, Stevan Labudović captured an era of politics, personality and promise, filming the birth of the Non-Aligned Movement. Sent on missions by the President to film liberation wars, he would play a key role in the information battles that defined the era of decolonization. Together with Ciné-Guerillas, this film diptych examines the legacy of these extraordinary archives, seeking to project their political vision forward.
results.title: Non-Aligned: Scenes from the Labudović Reels

results.original_title: Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds: Live at The Fonda Theatre
results.overview: 10 years ago on February 18th, 2013, Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds marked an evolution in their music by releasing the album Push The Sky Away, a subtle and beautiful record that set the scene for ongoing sonic explorations ever since.  To celebrate this anniversary, their performance at Los Angeles’ Fonda Theatre, from February 21st, 2013, will be available worldwide to watch for free, for a limited time. The band played Push The Sky Away in full followed by a set of classic tracks in the week of release. The concert was streamed worldwide on the night, live on YouTube.
results.title: Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds: Live at The Fonda Theatre

results.overview: The Complete Workout was designed by Jane Fonda as the new overall exercise class which would replace her original and New Workout classes. This program offers a half hour of aerobics which can be done at high or low intensity, or alternating between the two for an interval training effect to maximize fat burning. Upper and lower body toning segments precede and follow the aerobics which can be done with or without dumbbells or ankle weights.
results.title: Jane Fonda's Complete Workout

results.overview: I've always been a huge believer in walking to stay slim and healthy. Walking burns a lot of calories and slims the waistline, while also improving brain function and increasing both your heart and lung health. This includes two one-mile walking workouts that are simple, fun and fat-burning. Stick with me and do this WALKOUT regularly - you will be healthier and feel energized! Remember, it's never too late to start.
results.title: Jane Fonda: Prime Time - Walkout

results.overview: This is the program that started it all, and became the top VHS tape of all time. This program will give you total body aerobic, strength, and flexibility workout, while building and maintaining cardiovascular health. Includes both the Beginner's and Advanced Workouts, as seen on the original VHS tape and RCA Videodisc. Originally released in 1982 on VHS. Remastered and color corrected for DVD release in 2015.
results.title: Jane Fonda's Original Workout

results.original_title: Jane Fonda: Une Femme Passionnée et Passionnante
results.title: Jane Fonda: Une Femme Passionnée et Passionnante

results.original_title: Albert Cano Smit: Fondation Louis Vuitton
results.overview: Recital by pianist Albert Cano Smit at the Fondation Louis Vuitton auditorium, 15 February 2019, in a program of works by Bach, Ligeti, Beethoven, Scriabin, and Schumann.
results.title: Albert Cano Smit: Fondation Louis Vuitton
